title: Country Opening, Got To Go Back To Church, Candy Stories, Kid Finds 10K, Smoking Something, Parenting Tips, Fired From Job, Baller Questions, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Country Opening, Got To Go Back To Church, Candy Stories, Kid Finds 10K, Smoking Something, Parenting Tips, Fired From Job, Baller Questions, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The opening of the show is unique and country. We have the signs that tell you that you need to go back to church. Uncle Steve tells candy stories by describing each crew member as candy. A California 16 year old finds 10K and turns it in. You know you smoking something when you are doing certain things. The crew talks about their adult children and give parenting tips. Big Dog tells us about the jobs that he has been fired from. Uncle Steve has answers for those with questions for a baller. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO talks about giving God something to bless and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
